description: wool panel; gray background with a red and blue geometric border; blue, black, gray and cream chevron design on top and bottom; large, eight-sided shape in center with cream colored diamond in the middle with red stripes and black geometric iris shape in the center; abstract pillar shapes in brown, black and cream dye on right and left sides of center design
title: JB Moore style textile
